017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
023
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.nio.file.Path;
026import java.util.Collection;
027import java.util.Optional;
028
029import org.apiguardian.api.API;
030import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
031import org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.internal.INIFileImpl;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter;
033
034/**
035 *  The API for the access to Windows-style configuration files.
036 *
037 *  @note   Changes will not be persisted automatically!
038 *
039 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
040 *  @version $Id: INIFile.java 1062 2023-09-25 23:11:41Z tquadrat $
041 *
042 *  @UMLGraph.link
043 *  @since 0.1.0
044 */
045@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: INIFile.java 1062 2023-09-25 23:11:41Z tquadrat $" )
046@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
047public sealed interface INIFile
048    permits org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.internal.INIFileImpl
049{
050        /*---------------*\
051    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
052        \*---------------*/
053    /**
054     *  An entry for the INI file.
055     *
056     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
057     *  @version $Id: INIFile.java 1062 2023-09-25 23:11:41Z tquadrat $
058     *
059     *  @UMLGraph.link
060     *  @since 0.1.0
061     */
062    @SuppressWarnings( {"InnerClassOfInterface", "NewClassNamingConvention"} )
063    public record Entry( String group, String key, String value )
064    {
065            /*---------*\
066        ====** Methods **======================================================
067            \*---------*/
068        /**
069         *  Retrieves the value and translates it to the desired type.
070         *
071         *  @param  <T> The target type.
072         *  @param  stringConverter The implementation of
073         *      {@link StringConverter}
074         *      that is used to convert the stored value into the target type.
075         *  @return The value; can be {@code null}.
076         */
077        public final <T> T value( final StringConverter<? extends T> stringConverter )
078        {
079            final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( stringConverter, "stringConverter" ).fromString( value() );
080
081            //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
082            return retValue;
083        }   //  value()
084
085        /**
086         *  {@inheritDoc}
087         */
088        @Override
089        public final String toString() { return format( "%s/%s = %s", group, key, value ); }
090    }
091    //  record Entry
092
093        /*-----------*\
094    ====** Constants **========================================================
095        \*-----------*/
096    /**
097     *  The line length for an INI file: {@value}.
098     */
099    public static final int LINE_LENGTH = 75;
100
101        /*---------*\
102    ====** Methods **==========================================================
103        \*---------*/
104    /**
105     *  <p>{@summary Adds the given comment to the INI file.}</p>
106     *  <p>The new comment will be appended to an already existing one.</p>
107     *
108     *  @param  comment The comment.
109     */
110    public void addComment( final String comment );
111
112    /**
113     *  <p>{@summary Adds the given comment to the given group.}</p>
114     *  <p>The new comment will be appended to an already existing one.</p>
115     *
116     *  @param  group   The group.
117     *  @param  comment The comment.
118     */
119    public void addComment( final String group, final String comment );
120
121    /**
122     *  <p>{@summary Adds the given comment to the value that is identified by
123     *  the given group and key.}</p>
124     *  <p>The new comment will be appended to an already existing one.</p>
125     *
126     *  @param  group   The group.
127     *  @param  key The key for the value.
128     *  @param  comment The comment.
129     */
130    public void addComment( final String group, final String key, final String comment );
131
132    /**
133     *  <p>{@summary Creates an empty INI file.} If the file already exists, it
134     *  will be overwritten without notice.</p>
135     *  <p>The given file is used to store the value on a call to
136     *  {@link #save()}.</p>
137     *
138     *  @param  file    The file.
139     *  @return The new instance.
140     */
141    public static INIFile create( final Path file ) { return INIFileImpl.create( file ); }
142
143    /**
144     *  Retrieves the value for the given key from the given group.
145     *
146     *  @param  group   The group.
147     *  @param  key The key for the value.
148     *  @return An instance of
149     *      {@link Optional}
150     *      that holds the retrieved value.
151     */
152    public Optional<String> getValue( final String group, final String key );
153
154    /**
155     *  Retrieves the value for the given key from the given group.
156     *
157     *  @param  group   The group.
158     *  @param  key The key for the value.
159     *  @param  defaultValue    The value that will be returned if no other
160     *      value could be found; can be {@code null}.
161     *  @return The value.
162     */
163    public default String getValue( final String group, final String key, final String defaultValue )
164    {
165        final var retValue = getValue( group, key ).orElse( defaultValue );
166
167        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
168        return retValue;
169    }   //  getValue()
170
171    /**
172     *  Retrieves the value for the given key from the given group.
173     *
174     *  @param  <T> The target type.
175     *  @param  group   The group.
176     *  @param  key The key for the value.
177     *  @param  stringConverter The implementation of
178     *      {@link StringConverter}
179     *      that is used to convert the stored value into the target type.
180     *  @return An instance of
181     *      {@link Optional}
182     *      that holds the retrieved value.
183     */
184    public <T> Optional<T> getValue( final String group, final String key, final StringConverter<? extends T> stringConverter );
185
186    /**
187     *  Retrieves the value for the given key from the given group.
188     *
189     *  @param  <T> The target type.
190     *  @param  group   The group.
191     *  @param  key The key for the value.
192     *  @param  stringConverter The implementation of
193     *      {@link StringConverter}
194     *      that is used to convert the stored value into the target type.
195     *  @param  defaultValue    The value that will be returned if no other
196     *      value could be found; can be {@code null}.
197     *  @return The value.
198     */
199    public default <T> T getValue( final String group, final String key, final StringConverter<T> stringConverter, final T defaultValue )
200    {
201        final var retValue = getValue( group, key, stringConverter ).orElse( defaultValue );
202
203        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
204        return retValue;
205    }   //  getValue()
206
207    /**
208     *  Checks whether the INI file contains a group with the given name.
209     *
210     *  @param  group   The group.
211     *  @return {@code true} if there is a group with the given name,
212     *      {@code false} otherwise.
213     */
214    @SuppressWarnings( "BooleanMethodIsAlwaysInverted" )
215    public boolean hasGroup( final String group );
216
217    /**
218     *  Checks whether the INI file contains an entry with the given key.
219     *
220     *  @param  group   The group.
221     *  @param  key The key.
222     *  @return {@code true} if there is an entry with the given key,
223     *      {@code false} otherwise.
224     */
225    @SuppressWarnings( "BooleanMethodIsAlwaysInverted" )
226    public boolean hasValue( final String group, final String key );
227
228    /**
229     *  Returns all entries of the INI file.
230     *
231     *  @return The entries.
232     */
233    public Collection<Entry> listEntries();
234
235    /**
236     *  Loads the entries for the INI file.
237     *
238     *  @param  entries The entries.
239     */
240    public default void loadEntries( final Entry... entries )
241    {
242        for( final var entry : requireNonNullArgument( entries, "entries" ) )
243        {
244            setValue( entry.group(), entry.key(), entry.value() );
245        }
246    }   //  loadEntries()
247
248    /**
249     *  Loads the entries for the INI file.
250     *
251     *  @param  entries The entries.
252     */
253    public default void loadEntries( final Collection<Entry> entries )
254    {
255        loadEntries( entries.toArray( Entry []::new ) );
256    }   //  loadEntries()
257
258    /**
259     *  Opens the given INI file and reads its contents. If the file does not
260     *  exist yet, a new, empty file will be created.
261     *
262     *  @param  file    The file.
263     *  @return The new instance.
264     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when reading the file.
265     */
266    public static INIFile open( final Path file ) throws IOException { return INIFileImpl.open( file ); }
267
268    /**
269     *  Re-reads the values.
270     *
271     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when reading the file.
272     */
273    public void refresh() throws IOException;
274
275    /**
276     *  Saves the contents of the INI file to the file that was provided to
277     *  {@link #create(Path)}
278     *  or
279     *  {@link #open(Path)}.
280     *  This method has to be called to persist any changes made to the
281     *  contents of the INI file.
282     *
283     *  @throws IOException  A problem occurred when writing the contents to
284     *      the file.
285     */
286    public void save() throws IOException;
287
288    /**
289     *  Stores the given value with the given key to the given group.
290     *
291     *  @param  group   The group.
292     *  @param  key The key.
293     *  @param  value   The value.
294     */
295    public void setValue( final String group, final String key, final String value );
296
297    /**
298     *  Stores the given value with the given key to the given group.
299     *
300     *  @param  <S> The source type for the value.
301     *  @param  group   The group.
302     *  @param  key The key.
303     *  @param  value   The value.
304     *  @param  stringConverter The instance of
305     *      {@link StringConverter}
306     *      that is used to convert the value to a String.
307     */
308    public default <S> void setValue( final String group, final String key, final S value, final StringConverter<S> stringConverter )
309    {
310        setValue( group, key, requireNonNullArgument( stringConverter, "stringConverter" ).toString( value ) );
311    }   //  setValue()
312}
313//  interface INIFile
314
315/*
316 *  End of File
317 */
